column5: Hey guys .. like many of you probably, I flippin love ice cream..! and well i found out if you sign up to become a "Blizzard fan" on DQ.ca you get a bunch of free / discounted stuff.! even if you just sign up you get a buy 1 get 1 free med blizzard.. and well hey .. cant go wrong with discounts !  so go check it out ..!  -A fellow angler
haha but are you really gunna complain about free ice cream ?

DROoooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooool  Nothing like running to the Minden KD on a Sundy afternoon. A few neices and nephews have worked their summers there. Soon it'll be great neices and nephews   ( just as long as uncle always gets the extra big scoops)
Love the KD Moose tracks! DQ rocks too!
